definitions.definition: The plea or mode of defense under which a person on trial for a crime proves or attempts to prove being in another place when the alleged act was committed.
An excuse , especially one used to avoid responsibility or blame .

main_definition: ( law ) The plea or mode of defense under which a person on trial for a crime proves or attempts to prove being in another place when the alleged act was committed.
secondary_definitions: ( sometimes proscribed ) An excuse , especially one used to avoid responsibility or blame .
